Below are the files used for an Introduction to `R` workshop given at Simon Fraser University on Tuesday, March 3rd, 2020, in conjunction with the Psychology Graduate Student Caucus.

* [0-RunFirst.R](http://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/0-RunFirst.R)
* [1-IntroR.pdf](http://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/1-IntroR.pdf)
* [2a-Reproducible_Research.Rmd](http://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/2a-Reproducible_Research.Rmd)
* [2b-APA_Style.zip](http://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/2b-APA_Style.zip)
* [3-R_Packages_and_Support.Rmd](http://www.matthewsigal.com/StartR/3-R_Packages_and_Support.Rmd)
